text: Daniel James McKee (born June 16, 1951) is an American politician. In 2021, he became the 76th Governor of Rhode Island. McKee was the 69th Lieutenant Governor of Rhode Island from 2015 until 2021. He was mayor of Cumberland, Rhode Island and member of the Cumberland Town Council. ==References== Category:1951 births Category:Living people Category:Governors of Rhode Island Category:American mayors Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians Category:Lieutenant Governors of Rhode Island
title: Dan McKee
